message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split is fair and will save us from the risk of inflation.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about something closer to the middle? We both lose if this drags on.
I understand you want something more balanced, Bob.  This offer is still generous considering the inflation working against me.
Alice, the clock is ticking and we're both losing out. I'm offering a bit more, but this is a deal we need to take before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Bob, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but the inflation is a significant factor. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Every round that passes hurts you more than me, so take this deal!
